summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Eighth Avenue, now 32nd Avenue Northwest between the South line of Ship Street and now West 65th Street the North City limits (City of Ballard) now in the City of Seattle, by grubbing, grading and constructing concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 1177 of the City of Ballard, creating Local Improvement District No. B-146 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
